rukus.text: By those that line up in rows
And then charge fiercely (at the enemy)
Reciting Allah's Greatness (Allaho-akbar)
Indeed! There is only One Entity Whom you should worship
(And the One Whom you should worship is the) Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is in between, and Lord of the easts
We have indeed adorned the sky of this world with the glitter of the stars
And We have made it (the sky of this world) a safeguard against every defiant devil
They cannot listen to the deliberations of the Highest Assembly up there. And they are repelled from every side
They (the defiant devils) are driven off. And for them is perpetual punishment
In the exceptional case of a devil snatching away any secret, a piercing flame trails him
Ask them then whether what they have created was more difficult or what We have created. We have indeed created them of clinging clay
Nay! You wonder, while they mock
And when reminded, they take no heed
And when they see a (miraculous) sign (like Moses' staff turning into serpent), they mock at it
And say, "This is nothing but obvious magic
When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then be raised to life again
We or our fore-fathers
Say, "Yes! And you will be humble
And it will but be one big shout, and then they will see
And they will say, "O woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment
This is the Day of Distinction (of those going to Paradise from those going to Hell), which you used to deny
